name: silero-vad
description: Silero VAD: pre-trained enterprise-grade Voice Activity Detector
readme_summary: Silero VAD is a pre-trained Voice Activity Detector (VAD) that identifies speech segments in audio. It supports multiple platforms via PyTorch and ONNX, offering flexibility in deployment. The repository provides tools for loading the model, reading audio, and extracting speech timestamps, making it easy to integrate into various speech processing applications.
primary_use_case: Detecting voice activity in audio streams to isolate speech segments.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent librarian meticulously sifting through stacks of audio reels, using a special magnifying glass that highlights only the spoken words on each reel. The librarian carefully marks the start and end points of each spoken segment with glowing markers. Around the librarian, subtle UI elements display audio waveforms and code snippets related to voice activity detection. The scene is set in a quiet, well-lit library with a warm color scheme. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and a focus on simplicity and clarity.

name: shot-scraper
description: A command-line utility for taking automated screenshots of websites
readme_summary: shot-scraper is a command-line utility written in Python that automates the process of taking screenshots of websites. It leverages Playwright to provide a flexible and scriptable way to capture website screenshots for documentation, monitoring, or archival purposes.
key_features: Integration with Playwright for browser automation
GitHub Actions integration for automated screenshots
primary_use_case: Automating website screenshot capture for documentation, monitoring, and archival.
cover_image_prompt: A photographer in a digital darkroom, using a specialized camera to capture the essence of a website displayed on a glowing screen. The photographer carefully adjusts the focus and exposure, ensuring every detail is perfectly captured. The output is a vibrant, high-quality screenshot that materializes as a physical print. Small UI elements and code snippets float around the darkroom, subtly connecting the scene to software. The setting is a modern, minimalist studio with soft, diffused lighting. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: comic-translate
description: Desktop app for automatically translating comics - BDs, Manga, Manhwa, Fumetti and more in a variety of formats (Image, Pdf, Epub, cbr, cbz, etc) and in multiple languages.
readme_summary: Comic Translate is a desktop application written in Python designed for automatically translating comics, including BDs, Manga, Manhwa, and more, across various formats like images, PDFs, EPUBs, CBR, and CBZ. It leverages state-of-the-art Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT-4 to translate comics to and from multiple languages, including English, Korean, Japanese, and others, with support for text detection, OCR, inpainting, and text rendering.
key_features: Automatic translation of comics in various formats
Utilizes SOTA LLMs like GPT-4 for translation
primary_use_case: Automatically translating comics from various languages and formats into a user's desired language.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan sits at a digital drafting table, meticulously transforming comic panels from various cultures into a single, unified language. The artisan uses a set of advanced digital tools, represented by glowing icons, to seamlessly replace foreign text with perfectly rendered English. The original comic panels float around the artisan, connected by streams of light to the central translated panel. A subtle UI element displays the repository name, 'Comic Translate.' The scene is set in a bright, modern studio with a focus on clarity and precision. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and a vibrant color scheme.

name: ivory
description: Ivory is designed to simplify and visualise work with Postgres clusters. It provides patroni management ui and postgres query builder.
readme_summary: Ivory is a tool designed to simplify and visualize the management of Postgres clusters. It provides a user interface for Patroni, a tool for high availability Postgres clusters, and includes a Postgres query builder for troubleshooting and management tasks. It can be used as a local tool or a standalone application for collaborative use.
primary_use_case: Simplifying and visualizing Postgres cluster management for developers and database administrators.
cover_image_prompt: A gardener tending to a thriving garden of interconnected Postgres servers, each represented as a healthy plant. The gardener uses a watering can labeled 'Ivory' to nourish the plants, ensuring their health and stability. A small UI screen hovers nearby, displaying cluster metrics and configurations. Digital particles flow around the plants, representing data and queries. The repository name 'Ivory' is subtly etched into the watering can. The scene is set in a bright, sunny digital landscape. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: leetsolv
description: A spaced repetition CLI for DSA, powered by a custom SM-2 algorithm for deliberate practice.
readme_summary: LeetSolv is a command-line tool designed for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) problem revision using spaced repetition. It employs a customized SuperMemo 2 algorithm, incorporating factors like familiarity, importance, and reasoning to facilitate deliberate practice and long-term retention of DSA concepts.
key_features: Spaced Repetition using a custom SM-2 algorithm
primary_use_case: DSA problem revision and long-term retention through spaced repetition.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent student sitting at a desk, surrounded by stacks of coding books, using a magical hourglass to schedule their study sessions. The hourglass represents the spaced repetition algorithm, with sand flowing to indicate when each problem is due for review. A holographic screen displays a LeetCode problem, and the student is actively solving it. Small code snippets and data structures float around the student, subtly connecting the scene to software. The scene is set in a cozy library with warm, inviting lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: TaskWing
description: Your AI Product Manager That Understands Your Project
readme_summary: TaskWing is an AI-powered CLI task manager designed for developers. It integrates with AI tools via the Model Context Protocol (MCP), allowing users to manage tasks from the terminal or leverage AI for assistance. It features zero-config setup, smart dependency tracking, and a learning system to capture patterns from completed projects.
primary_use_case: AI-powered task management for developers, integrating with AI tools to automate and enhance task handling.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect stands before a complex blueprint, using an AI assistant to manage and organize the project's many tasks. The architect points to a section of the blueprint, and the AI assistant, visualized as a helpful robot, automatically creates and prioritizes tasks on a digital display. The display shows task dependencies and progress. Small screens show code snippets and MCP protocol interactions. The scene is set in a brightly lit, modern design studio. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines, vibrant colors, and a focus on clarity and understanding.

name: how-to-build-a-coding-agent
description: A workshop that teaches you how to build your own coding agent. Similar to Roo code, Cline, Amp, Cursor, Windsurf or OpenCode.
readme_summary: This repository provides a workshop that guides users through building their own AI-powered coding assistant using Go. The workshop progresses through six versions of the agent, each adding more features like file reading, shell command execution, and code searching, ultimately creating a powerful local developer assistant.
key_features: Connect to the Anthropic Claude API
Add tools like reading files, editing code, and running commands
Build an agent that gets smarter with each step
primary_use_case: Building a personal AI-powered coding assistant.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect overseeing a construction site where digital bricks are being assembled into a towering code structure. The architect uses a blueprint generated by an AI assistant, which is displayed on a nearby holographic screen. Robotic arms are placing the digital bricks according to the AI's instructions, while the architect monitors progress. The scene is set in a futuristic workshop filled with glowing data streams and subtle code visualizations. The repository name is subtly displayed on the blueprint. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with bright colors and sharp details.

name: filesql
description: filesql - sql driver for CSV, TSV, LTSV, Parquet, Excel with gzip, bzip2, xz, zstd support.
readme_summary: filesql is a Go SQL driver that allows querying various file formats (CSV, TSV, LTSV, Parquet, Excel) using SQLite3 SQL syntax. It supports compressed files (gzip, bzip2, xz, zstd) and offers features like stream processing and auto-saving changes back to files.
key_features: Multiple File Formats support (CSV, TSV, LTSV, Parquet, Excel)
Flexible Input Sources (file paths, directories, io.Reader, embed.FS)
primary_use_case: Querying data files (CSV, TSV, LTSV, Parquet, Excel) using SQL without needing a separate database server or data transformation.
cover_image_prompt: A librarian standing in a grand library, using a magnifying glass to examine various books labeled 'CSV', 'TSV', 'Excel', and 'Parquet'. As the librarian reads, the text from the books magically transforms into structured data displayed on a nearby holographic screen. Subtle tech elements like glowing data streams and UI elements showing SQL queries are visible. The scene is set in a warmly lit, classic library with modern holographic interfaces. The composition is focused and clear, with a rich color scheme. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details.
